content.heading: HTML Headings
paragraphs: HTML headings are titles or subtitles displayed on a webpage.

content.heading: HTML Headings Tags
paragraphs: HTML headings are defined with the <h1> to <h6> tags. <h1> defines the most important heading, while <h6> defines the least important heading.

content.heading: Importance of Headings
paragraphs: Search engines use headings to index the structure and content of web pages. Users often skim a page by its headings, making it important to use headings to show document structure.

content.heading: Bigger Headings
paragraphs: Each HTML heading has a default size. You can specify the size for any heading using the style attribute with the CSS font-size property.
